title: Bug 101187: Localization key can't be blank when adding
description: If the key is left blank, the externalized text cannot be displayed in the chart.
OB: When the key is left blank in the properties file, but it has a valid value, the externalized text is not displayed in the chart title.
EB: When the key is left blank in the properties file, but it has a valid value, the externalized text should be displayed in the chart title.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Open the properties file related to chart localization.
2. Leave the key blank while providing a valid value.
3. Check the chart title and confirm that the externalized text is not displayed.
